Name: BENS050 - Email High Score
Output_template:
{"subject":"Housing benefit and Council tax support - Reference: {emailReference}","fromName":"Daniel Testing","from":"no.reply@portsmouthcc.gov.uk","recipients_to":"{confToEmail}","recipients_cc":"daniel.gregory@portsmouthcc.gov.uk","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"","body":"

Dear {CoC_ClaimantName/Title_out} {CoC_ClaimantName/Surname_out},


Thank you for contacting the benefits service at Portsmouth City Council.

This is to confirm that your application for housing benefit and/or council tax support has been received.

Your application cannot be passed to our processing team for assessment because we require;

@af:if({Earnings_Check_claim} = '1')

Evidence of your earnings

Please provide Evidence of your earnings for each job you hold.

  • This should be in the form of 5 weekly, 2 monthly or 3 fortnightly payslips.
  • If you have just started your employment you can provide the contract of employment, then provide your pay slips as and when you receive them.
  • Alternatively you can ask your employer to complete the Confirmation of earnings Form
@endaf:if
@af:if({Earnings_Check_part} = '1')

Evidence of your partners earnings

Please provide Evidence of your partners earnings for each job they hold.

  • This should be in the form of 5 weekly, 2 monthly or 3 fortnightly payslips.
  • If they have just started the employment you can provide the contract of employment, then provide their pay slips as and when they are received.
  • Alternatively you can ask your employer to complete the Confirmation of earnings Form
@endaf:if
@af:if({Earnings_Check_both} = '1')

Evidence of earnings for both you and your partner

Please provide Evidence of earnings for each of the jobs you and your partner hold.

  • This should be in the form of 5 weekly, 2 monthly or 3 fortnightly payslips.
  • If you or your partner have just started the employment you can provide the contract of employment, then provide pay slips as and when they are received.
  • Alternatively you can ask your employer to complete the Confirmation of earnings Form
@endaf:if
@af:if({Property_Check1} = '1')

@af:if({havePartner} != '1')

Evidence of your property

@endaf:if
@af:if({havePartner} = '1')

Evidence of property for both you and your partner

@endaf:if
  • Please confirm, in writing, the circumstances surrounding you owning a property. Please also confirm the address of the property you own.
  • If you are currently taking steps to obtain possesion of a property, please provide evidence of the date you first sought legal advice or started legal proceedings.
  • If the property requires essential repairs or alterations and you have taken steps to make it fit for occupation as your home, please provide evidence of when you began this process.
  • If the property is for sale, please provide evidence of this. This could be in the form of documentaion you have received from your estate agent, solictor etc.
  • If you have divorced your partner or dissolved your civil partnership with them or become estranged from them, please confirm the following:
    • Is your former partner still occupying the property, if so are they a lone parent?
    and/or
    • When did it cease to be occupied?
  • If the circumstances surrounding you owning a property is not covered above, please provide as much infomation as possible.
@endaf:if
@af:if({Rent_Check1} = '1')

Evidence of your rent

You must provide original evidence of rent. This could be:

  • Your rent book
  • Your tenancy/licence agreement
  • A letter from your landlord confirming

Please ensure that the rent proof you provide includes:

  • The rent amount and frequency,
  • The start date of tenancy ,
  • Any services included in the rent.

If you are unable to provide one of the above, please print off the Confirmation of Tenancy details form and arrange for your landlord to complete it. You must then return this to us.

@endaf:if
@af:if({Childcare_Check1} = '1')

Evidence of your childcare costs

If you/your partner pay childcare to either an after school club, nursery or registered childminder. Please ask the childcare provider to complete the Confirmation of Childcare costs form

@endaf:if
@af:if({self_Employed_Check_both} = '1')

Evidence of self employed for both you and your partner

You have indicated that you and your partner are Self employed.

  • We will contact you for further information, however in the meantime please complete the Self employment pro forma
@endaf:if
@af:if({self_Employed_Check_claim} = '1')

Evidence of your self employed

You have indicated that you are Self employed.

  • We will contact you for further information, however in the meantime please complete the Self employment pro forma
@endaf:if
@af:if({self_Employed_Check_part} = '1')

Evidence of your partners self employed

You have indicated that your partner is Self employed.

  • We will contact you for further information, however in the meantime please complete the Self employment pro forma
@endaf:if
@af:if({Student_Check1} = '1')

Evidence of student

Please provide evidence of {selectWhoStudent} student status. This should be a letter or certificate from the College/University/Educational establishment.

The letter/certificate must confirm:

  • the course being studied
  • the qualification it leads to
  • the number of guided learning hours completed each week
  • the start and end date of the course
  • whether the college/university or educational establishment treat the course as Full or Part time.
@endaf:if
@af:if({Other_Adult_Income_Check1} = '1')

Evidence of other adults income

Please supply proof of income for each non dependant living within your household.

  • If they are working, please provide their recent payslips (5 weekly, 3 fortnightly or 2 monthly / 4 weekly payslips)
  • If they have just started work and have not received a payslip, please provide their contract of employment. If they are working voluntarily please provide their contract of employment
  • If they are not working please provide official documentation of any income they are in receipt of or a statement of income, advising how they are meeting there day to day living expenses (for example, how are they buying food)?
@endaf:if
@af:if({Capital_Check1} = '1')
@af:if({havePartner} != '1')

Evidence of your capital

@endaf:if
@af:if({havePartner} = '1')

Evidence of capital for both you and your partner

@endaf:if

All capital, including savings and investments (two recent consecutive months statements for each account held).

@endaf:if
@af:if({ClaimantIncomeCheck} = '1')

Evidence of your Income

  • You are required to provide evidence of all income you receive
@endaf:if
@af:if({partnerIncomeCheck} = '1')

Evidence of your Partners Income

  • You are required to provide evidence of all your partners income they receive
@endaf:if
@af:if({bothIncomeCheck} = '1')

Evidence of both you and your Partners Income

  • You are required to provide evidence of all income that you and your partner receive
@endaf:if
@af:if({claimantIDCheck} = '1')

Evidence of identity

In order to confirm your identity and nationality the following is required

  • Two forms of ID such as a Passport, Driving License or utility bill.
  • Evidence of your National insurance number, such as your national insurance number card or a letter from HM Revenues and Customs.
@af:if({nationCheckClaimant} = '1')
Should we require further information regards your Nationality or your residency within the United Kingdom, we will be in contact.
@endaf:if
@endaf:if
@af:if({partnerIDCheck} = '1')

Evidence of identity

In order to confirm your partners identity and nationality the following is required

  • Two forms of ID such as a Passport, Driving License or utility bill.
  • Evidence of their National insurance number, such as their national insurance number card or a letter from HM Revenues and Customs.
@af:if({nationCheckPartner} = '1')
Should we require Further information regards your partners Nationality or residency within the United Kingdom, we will be in contact.
@endaf:if
@endaf:if
@af:if({bothIDCheck} = '1')

Evidence of identity

In order to confirm both you and your partners identity and nationality the following is required

  • Two forms of ID for each or you such as a Passport, Driving License or utility bill.
  • Evidence of both your National insurance numbers, such as a national insurance number card or a letter from HM Revenues and Customs.
@af:if({nationCheckClaimant} = '1')
Should we require further information regards your Nationality or your residency within the United Kingdom, we will be in contact.
@endaf:if
@af:if({nationCheckPartner} = '1')
Should we require Further information regards your partners Nationality or residency within the United Kingdom, we will be in contact.
@endaf:if
@af:if({nationCheckBoth} = '1')
Should we require Further information regards your or your partners Nationality or residency within the United Kingdom, we will be in contact.
@endaf:if
@endaf:if
@af:if({claimNINOCheck} = '1')

You have advised that you do not have a National Insurance Number (NINO). To claim housing benefit and /or council tax support a person is required to have a NINO. If you are unsure as to whether you have one, try looking at one of the following:

  • A P45 or P60.
  • Payslips or pension statements.
  • A letter from the HM Revenues and Customs about tax or tax credits.
  • A NINO may be used as a pay reference for some benefits, therefore it may appear on a bank statement.
  • A letter from the Jobcentre Plus, Pension Service or other government department.
  • You may have also been provided with a NINO card.

If you have at least one of the above containing your NINO then please provide this as evidence. If not you must contact the Department of Work and Pensions to apply for a NINO. Please advise us once you have done so.

@endaf:if
@af:if({partnerNINOCheck} = '1')

You have advised that your partner does not have a National Insurance Number (NINO). To claim housing benefit and /or council tax support a person is required to have a NINO. If you are unsure as to whether your partner has one, try looking at one of the following:

  • A P45 or P60.
  • Payslips or pension statements.
  • A letter from the HM Revenues and Customs about tax or tax credits.
  • A NINO may be used as a pay reference for some benefits, therefore it may appear on a bank statement.
  • A letter from the Jobcentre Plus, Pension Service or other government department.
  • Your partner may have also been provided with a NINO card.

If your partner has at least one of the above containing their NINO then please provide this as evidence. If not they must contact the Department of Work and Pensions to apply for a NINO. Please advise us once they have done so.

@endaf:if
@af:if({bothNINOCheck} = '1')

You have advised that you and your partner do not have a National Insurance Number (NINO). To claim housing benefit and /or council tax support a person is required to have a NINO. If you are unsure as to whether you or your partner have one, try looking at one of the following:

  • A P45 or P60.
  • Payslips or pension statements.
  • A letter from the HM Revenues and Customs about tax or tax credits.
  • A NINO may be used as a pay reference for some benefits, therefore it may appear on a bank statement.
  • A letter from the Jobcentre Plus, Pension Service or other government department.
  • You or Your partner may have also been provided with a NINO card.

If you and your partner has at least one of the above containing your NINOs then please provide one of these for each or you as evidence. If not then you and any partners must contact the Department of Work and Pensions to apply for a NINO. Please advise us once you/they have done so.

@endaf:if
@af:if({PayLandlord_Check1} = '1')

Pay your Landlord

You ave advised that you would like us to send your housing benefit direct to your landlord. In order to do this, both you and your landlord must complete an Authority to pay housing benefit direct to landlord form

@endaf:if

 

You are required to provide original documents as evidence - photocopies cannot be accepted.

This evidence must be provided by {Due_Date1} (no further reminders will be issued). If you fail to meet this time limit then a decision will be made that you are not entitled to housing benefit and/or council tax support.

Should we require any further information, we will contact you via the contact details you have provided.

@af:if({havePartner} != '1')

We may need to contact you for evidence of your Identification and National Insurance number

@endaf:if
@af:if({havePartner} = '1')

We may need to contact you for evidence of your and any partners Identification and National Insurance number

@endaf:if

If anything that you have submitted in your application form changes, you must tell the benefits service immediately.

We can be contacted via HBSupportTeam@portsmouthcc.gov.uk or by telephone on 023 9283 4556.

This is an automated response; please do not reply to this email.


Yours sincerely

Revenues and Benefits Department

Portsmouth City Council
